data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Namin, Saeed Mohamadzade, Korneyev, Valery A. (2018): An annotated checklist of fruit flies (Diptera: Tephritidae) of Iran. Zootaxa 4369 (3): 377-405, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4369.3.5
